## Goal of the lecture

1. Expose the students to the history and current state of IoT technology 
2. Make the students realize that they are either wearing, holding or carrying an IoT device 
3. Demo: Provide a working IoT application using the Raspberry Pi and the senseHat module
4. Case discussion: How Domino's Pizza reinvented their pizza story using IoT
